abstract: Labor organizers say McDonald’s workers in 19 cities have filed complaints over burns from popping grease, a lack of protective equipment and other workplace hazards.
lead_paragraph: McDonald’s workers in 19 cities have filed complaints over burns from popping grease, a lack of protective equipment and other workplace hazards, according to labor organizers.

headline.main: Labor Organizers Disclose Complaints at McDonald’s
headline.print_headline: Labor Organizers Disclose Complaints at McDonald’s

snippet: McDonald’s workers in 19 cities have filed complaints over burns from popping grease, a lack of protective equipment and other workplace hazards, according to labor organizers.
